plugin.title: Accelerate forum downloads
Replace old thumb attachements links

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase:
Enter up to 4 mirror domains, to load local images faster. For example:

http://img1.myforum.com
http://img2.myforum.com
http://img3.myforum.com
http://img4.myforum.com

If don't use mirrors - leave this field blank or set to forum domain.

ONLY set yes, if you have NGINX websever!!!

Other webservers don't catch X-Accel-Redirect headers!!!
Relative web-server URI to attachments directory. No trailing slash allowed.
